column5: Every James Bond film ranked. And yes, I'm including the non-Eon Productions films too. Bond actors ranked (favorite first): 1. Timothy Dalton 2. Daniel Craig 3. Sean Connery 4. Roger Moore 5. Pierce Brosnan 6. David Niven 7. George Lazenby Favorite villain: Max Zorin Favorite henchman: Jaws Favorite Bond girl: Vesper Lynd Best M: Bernard Lee Best Q: Desmond Llewelyn (of course) Best Moneypenny: Lois Maxwell Best Felix Leiter: David Hedison (Licence to Kill) Best Blofeld: Telly Savalas (On Her Majestyâ€™s Secret Service) Best name: "Pussy Galore" Favorite title song: "Goldfinger" Favorite title sequence: Casino Royale Favorite villain lair: You Only Live Twice volcano base Favorite gadget: wetsuit with rubber duck glued to hood Favorite one-liner/quip: "I thought Christmas only comes once a year" (The World Is Not Enough)
